title: I still have the old client icon on my desktop

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I use to have to new client icon but then I moved my LoL files to another disk to run league on but then I couldn't launch LoL anymore. So I reinstalled LoL but then this old icon is here and can't get my hands on the new icon anymore, which I use to use. I doesn't bother me at all but I wish to get the new one because I have use to it already. Also I tried to use the hextech repair tool reinstalled LoL also didn't work.

replies.body: You'll want to have League running from your primary internal drive.  Anything else may cause issues like only temporarily saving files, requiring a repatch every time you launch.  Since things are a bit wonky here, your best bet may be to download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a clean reinstall.  That should clear away the grime and fix up your files!
